views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

Memento enhances your screenshot experience by allowing you to customize the destination, effects and behavior of screenshots.


• Copy screenshots to your clipboard
• Upload screenshots to Imgur
• Share screenshots through a share menu
• Show a prompt to select screenshot destination
• Disable the shutter sound
• Disable the screen flash
• Prevent apps from being notified of screenshots

Configure options from Settings
